pullrequest.title: Set RGBD camera far clip to 10 meters

content.raw:
The `<camera><clip>` distances will remain the same as those will be the clipping distances for the rgb portion of the camera. To add the depth clipping element, the following will need to be added under the `<camera>` element

```
<depth_camera>
  <clip>
    <near>0.1</near>
    <far>10</far>
  </clip>
</depth_camera>
```

‌
content.html:
The <camera><clip> distances will remain the same as those will be the clipping distances for the rgb portion of the camera. To add the depth clipping element, the following will need to be added under the <camera> element
